title: Exploratory Programming for the Arts & Humanities
Atom
creator: Github, pre-acquisition
submitter_comment: IDE from a bygone era. No-frills at first, good for those who like downloading add-ons. Chaotic Good.

title: Brackets
creator: Adobe
submitter_comment: IDE made for front-end development. Consider using this over others if your CSS gets crazy. If you're going to be spending a lot of time making websites, check this out.

title: VS Code
creator: Microsoft
submitter_comment: Go forth with the power of a corporation and wide adoption behind you. Many projects on the internet will require you to know this well in order to participate meaningfully. Maybe we're all destined to use this one day.

title: XCode
creator: Apple
submitter_comment: Must know it if you want to build on Apple products. Lawful Evil.

title: Pure Data
creator: Pure Data
submitter_comment: An OG, open source favorite for manipulating audio. Great for synthesizers and audio buffs.

title: Max MSP
creator: Cycling 74
submitter_comment: An OG, open source favorite for manipulating audio. Great for synthesizers and audio buffs.
